GSD.product_version: versions from v4.1 to before v4.19.254
GSD.description:
tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_probe_threshold.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.254 by commit 96900fa61777402eb5056269d8000aace33a8b6c, it was introduced in version v4.1 by commit 6b58e0a5f32dedb609438bb9c9c82aa6e23381f2. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_probe_threshold.
